text_block_list.text:
Almond Eye is a flawless Umamusume. That’s a well-
known story even among Trainers.

And the truth of that... if you spend time at Tracen 
Academy, you’ll naturally come to know it.
――Oh my, perfect scores in every subject again. Really, Ai-san, you’re so smart.
text_block_list.name: Lucky Lilac

text_block_list.text:
Because I don’t want to lose by even a single point. 
If it’s a perfect score, I can feel at ease, right?
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
choice_data_list: <size=31>(Perfect scores in every subject... as expected.)</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ai, look! It’s the carrot rose we saw together on TV 
the other day!
text_block_list.name: Blast Onepiece

text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Well, you wanted to eat it, didn’t you? And I 
thought I’d like to try making it too.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye

text_block_list.text: And then, one afternoon after class―
Haaaahhh...!
text_block_list.name: <size=35>Almond Eye & Others</size>
Lala & Blast
text_block_list.text: Hah... Hah... Hah...!

I was asked to help run alongside Almond Eye and 
the others, and was watching over them...
choice_data_list: <size=31>(The result, and even the race itself, was perfect...)</size>

text_block_list.text:
The result was a landslide victory for Almond Eye. 
I was left speechless, unable to find a single flaw.

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: ――Alright, I win!

text_block_list.name: Lucky Lilac
text_block_list.text:
Haa~ you’re scary... You could’ve at least held back 
a little in the parallel run.

Fufu. I don’t want to lose, so no. Besides, I didn’t 
have that kind of leeway!
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
Blast Onepiece
text_block_list.text: Really? Boo, it didn’t look that way at all!
choice_data_list: <size=24>I think I was almost perfect too... I also think I was almost perfect...</size>
<size=24>I think I was almost perfect too... I also think I was almost perfect...</size>

text_block_list.text:
No. First of all... Lala, your marking has gotten 
much better than before.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Blast’s finishing kick had become even sharper.

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text:
Both of them are definitely growing. This isn’t the 
time to hold back.
I can’t afford to lose either!
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
choice_data_list: I’d like to learn from that mentality.
<size=30>Could your flawless focus be the secret to your speed?</size>
<size=26>Could your flawless focus be the secret to your speed? (formal)</size>

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: I can’t afford to lose either!
choice_data_list: I’d like to learn from that mentality.
<size=30>Could your flawless focus be the secret to your speed?</size>
<size=26>Could your flawless focus be the secret to your speed? (formal)</size>

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! But you’ve gotta be careful! If a human 
tried to imitate Ai, they’d collapse!
text_block_list.name: Blast Onepiece

text_block_list.text:
I can’t exactly say that’s not true... I often get 
carried away and overheat...
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
Lucky Lilac
text_block_list.text:
Truly a frightening person, huh? No matter how 
much she wins, she’s never satisfied.

Because I want to win a lot! ...Now then, let’s go 
for another round♪
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
